title: Historic Building, Walking Distance To Eateries
posting_body: Nestled in the eclectic Near Southside neighborhood of Fort Worth's Medical District.
Central locale puts you close to shopping, entertainment, and cultural venues.
Walk to many local eateries and watering holes such as Pouring Glory, Cannon Chinese Kitchen, Republic Street Bar, and popular microbrewery next door, Rahr & Sons Brewing.
Convenient location that makes it easy to get around with quick access to major highways I-35W, I-30, and US 287.

Our new construction breathes life into an early-1920s Coca-Cola bottling plant, while maintaining historic details such as original exterior brick, reclaimed wood beams along open ceilings, and concrete flooring along the central corridor reminiscent of an earlier time.
State-of-the-art Fitness Center or gather with friends in one of two Game Rooms.
Outside, spend some time in the sun by the swimming pool or hang out by the fire pit, cabanas and grills.
Granite countertops, brushed nickel fixtures, hardwood style flooring, and brand new black and stainless steel appliances.
